Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Budget discussion centres on responsible cost-of-living relief and more opportunities without adding to inflation. The government emphasizes the importance of creating a just transition to a net-zero emissions economy and ensuring no worker or community is left behind. In a series of tweets the government also announced their commitment to improving vocational and education training and investing in aged care wages to support a primarily female workforce - women's equality is at the heart of everything they do.
